results.title: Ride
results.creator_credit: Matthew Hunt, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Matt Hunt talks candidly about his all-consuming addiction: riding bikes. It is an obsession that has changed the way he looks at the world, cost him physically and financially but one that he is not likely to give up soon.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Matthew Hunt, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Matt Hunt talks candidly about his all-consuming addiction: riding bikes. It is an obsession that has changed the way he looks at the world, cost him physically and financially but one that he is not likely to give up soon.

results.title: Yoram Gross : Screen Worlds Spotlight interview

video_links.name: Yoram Gross : Screen Worlds Spotlight interview

results.brief_description: An interview with producer Yoram Gross for Screen Worlds at ACMI. Yoram Gross founded the Yoram Gross Film Studio and was known for his work on animated films and TV series including “Blinky Bill”, the “Dot” series, and “The Magic Riddle”.
results.description: An interview with producer Yoram Gross for Screen Worlds at ACMI. Yoram Gross founded the Yoram Gross Film Studio and was known for his work on animated films and TV series including “Blinky Bill”, the “Dot” series, and “The Magic Riddle”.
description_for_label: An interview with producer Yoram Gross for Screen Worlds at ACMI. Yoram Gross founded the Yoram Gross Film Studio and was known for his work on animated films and TV series including “Blinky Bill”, the “Dot” series, and “The Magic Riddle”.

results.title: Sue Smith and John Alsop : Screen Worlds Spotlight interview

video_links.name: Sue Smith and John Alsop : Screen Worlds Spotlight interview

results.brief_description: An interview with screenwriters Sue Smith and John Alsop for Screen Worlds at ACMI. Sue Smith and John Alsop are screenwriters and playwrights who have collaborated on productions such as “My Brother Jack”, “Brides of Christ”, “Bordertown” and “The Leaving of Liverpool”.

results.title: Rolf de Heer: Screen Worlds Spotlight interview

video_links.name: Rolf de Heer: Screen Worlds Spotlight interview

results.brief_description: An interview with director Rolf de Heer for Screen Worlds at ACMI. Rolf de Heer is a film director whose credits include “Ten Canoes”, “Charlie’s Country” and “The Tracker”.

video_links.name: Jill Bilcock: Screen Worlds Spotlight interview

results.title: Chris Masters: Screen Worlds Spotlight interview

video_links.name: Chris Masters: Screen Worlds Spotlight interview

results.brief_description: An interview with journalist Chris Masters created for Screen Worlds at ACMI. Chris Masters is an investigative journalist who has won several Gold Walkley awards and reported for the ABC’s “Four Corners”.

results.title: Chris Doyle: Screen Worlds Spotlight interview

video_links.name: Chris Doyle: Screen Worlds Spotlight interview

results.brief_description: An interview with cinematographer Chris Doyle for Screen Worlds at ACMI. Chris Doyle is a cinematographer well known for his work on films directed by Wong Kar Wai, including “Chungking Express”, “In the Mood for Love” and “Happy Together”.

results.title: Cate Blanchett: Screen Worlds Spotlight interview

video_links.name: Cate Blanchett: Screen Worlds Spotlight interview

results.brief_description: An interview with actor Cate Blanchett for Screen Worlds at ACMI. Cate Blanchett is an actor who has multiple awards including Golden Globe and Academy awards, and is well known for her roles in films such as “Elizabeth”, “Carol” and “I’m Not There”.
results.description: An interview with actor Cate Blanchett for Screen Worlds at ACMI. Cate Blanchett is an actor who has multiple awards including Golden Globe and Academy awards, and is well known for her roles in films such as “Elizabeth”, “Carol” and “I’m Not There”.

results.title: Animal Logic: Screen Worlds Spotlight interview

video_links.name: Animal Logic: Screen Worlds Spotlight interview

results.brief_description: An interview with Animal Logic for Screen Worlds at ACMI. Animal Logic is an animation and visual effects digital studio known for their role on films such as “Happy Feet”, “The Lego Movie” and “Peter Rabbit”.
